oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design, fabrication and preliminary testing of a two-axes solar tracking system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, JV
NAYAK, JK
SUNDERSINGH, VP
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A two-axes equator based tracking mechanism with computer control for solar photovoltaic modules has been designed,fabricated and tested. The performance of the system is quite satisfactory; the tracking error is quite small. Tracking leads to an increase in the output of the PV modules typically by about 30 %. The operation of the tracker is found to consume a very small fraction of the output power.
